39aa7f69-f301-4b17-9e7e-69c275493fba:
As a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}, a student of war can study a foe she can see and attempt a Knowledge {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}check{/g} appropriate to the creature's type. Success grants her a +1 insight {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} against her enemy, which can be applied via one of the following stances (chosen when the {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} is attempted) to the indicated statistics and {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g}.
Defensive Stance: The bonus applies to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}Armor Class{/g} and on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}. At 6th level, the student of war gets a +3 bonus to her AC against {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
Martial Stance: The bonus applies on attack and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} against the target. At 6th level, the student of war gets a +3 bonus to her {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}Crit{/g} confirmation rolls while in Martial stance.
Tactical Stance: The bonus applies on {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} checks and to {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} when initiating or defending against combat maneuvers.
A student of war can change her stance as a move {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}action{/g}. The bonus increases to +2 at 4th level and +3 at 7th level.
At 7th level, the student can use this ability as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} rather than a move action.
d19a126b-360f-4c58-90ea-282396b1c8d4: At 10th level, a student of war can find weak spots where none should exist. A student of war who uses her know your enemy ability can ignore the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g} and immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hits{/g}.
ab46a559-2b67-4d67-a299-227335610b69: At 1st level and every two levels after, student of war gains one skill as a class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g}.
7d2bd72f-30f6-4fac-9e28-3aa2a8a330d0: At 2nd level, a student of war can use her {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} modifier in place of her {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} modifier for determining her {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}Armor Class{/g}. The armor's normal {g|Encyclopedia:Max_Dex_Bonus}maximum Dexterity bonus{/g} still applies (limiting how much of the character's Intelligence bonus she can apply to her AC).
a40187de-a85a-4352-a8dd-08a990a05416: At 2nd, 5th, and 8th levels, a student of war gains a bonus combat {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
f0b23863-50bc-4f3c-ba7f-528e415b1dab: At 3rd level, student of war can withstand even mental and unusual {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} with great will. If she makes a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g} against an attack that normally deals half {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} on a successful save, she instead takes no damage.
b12f6258-e538-4a8c-bb0d-4329f5f01957: At 4th level, the student of war gets a +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to her {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} confirmation {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g} while in martial stance.
139a0007-8e51-4c7b-affa-6b4ba21f8bfa: At 6th level, a student of war can aim her blows at the weakest point in a studied foe's defense, ignoring up to 5 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}. This does not apply to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} reduction without a type (such as DR 10/-). This ability cannot be used against creatures that are immune to {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hits{/g} or otherwise lack discernible weak points.
583adaa2-1378-4eed-b63d-279e670af599: At 6th level, the student of war gets a +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to her {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g} while in defensive stance.
ada55049-9b75-47b9-87f2-a8afaa05bb75: At 7th level, the student can use Know Your Enemy ability as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} rather than a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}.
d950b815-e9db-4980-94d9-48c664d1b679: At 9th level, once per day as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, a student of war can focus on a weapon she holds and render it anathema to her studied foe. The weapon gains the bane special ability for 1 minute.
eadd8a5c-463c-4b72-8395-8b1a55db6076: Defensive Stance: The bonus from Know Your Enemy ability applies to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}Armor Class{/g} and on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}.
963c6ee8-7435-40b6-8f89-382a51b80405: Martial Stance: The bonus from Know Your Enemy ability applies on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} against the target.
1199a9b1-7177-4279-b3cd-fb6d8367a856: Tactical Stance: The bonus from Know Your Enemy ability applies on {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} and to {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} when initiating or defending against combat maneuvers.
6ab87e60-0b0c-4f3a-931d-6f63da06e0c4: The path of the student of war is particularly enticing to martially minded characters who seek to enhance and expand their mastery of skills. Students of war often pride themselves in studying topics that combat-focused types might not normally find value in, and their ability to draw upon unexpected lore and information has become something of a legend among their kind.
